text: Moranopteris aphelolepis is a species of grammitid fern in the family Polypodiaceae. It is endemic to the Andes Mountains, in Colombia, Ecuador and Bolivia. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Polypodiaceae Category:Ferns of Ecuador Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Ferns of the Americas Category:Vulnerable flora of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Moranopteris aphelolepis
